selfIntro: Hi,my name is nykee .And i am interested in Web front-end!I am working at a start-up company as a web developer
My skills about web development are as followed：
1、Familiar with Web front end common framework
2、interested and have some experience in web front-end data visualization（wiz lib eg: echarts、D3)
3、know a little bit of Java Web development skills eg: Mysql,Spring,SpringMVC,Mybatis
4、able to develop a project from back-end to front-end
And I am glad to code wiz coffee and electronic music
message.aboutMeSlogan: Web FrontEnd Engineer,Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

projects_nykee.name: www.nykee.cn
projects_nykee.description_2: Using Vue, iview, vue-router, Vuex family bucket development, i18n international adaptation and responsive adaptation
projects_nykee.description_3: Optimize the first screen loading: iview loads on demand, third party relies on CDN, image compression uses Webp format and deploys in cloud, webpack and backend configuration Gzip compression
projects_nykee.description_4: use Vue and vue-router and Vuex
projects_nykee.description_5: Purchased the domain name www.nykee.cn for binding
projects_nykee.description_6: Previously deployed on github,recently it has been migrated to Alibaba Cloud.

projects_wkzf.name: 悟空找房EAS项目
projects_wkzf.description_1: 金蝶EAS财务软件二次开发项目，甲方为悟空找房
projects_wkzf.description_2: 悟空找房自有财务系统与金蝶EAS系统之间使用WebService推送单据开发：1、基于金蝶自有封装的WebService进行开发、2、WebService接口联调、3、WebService的测试及发布
projects_wkzf.description_3: 悟空找房项目EAS报销流程二次开发配置：1、报销单单据界面配置（包括桌面端与web页面单据布局配置与单据字段配置）2、工作流EAS客户端配置与二次开发 （包括角色配置、报销金额条件判断、流程跳转等）3、报销单单据流程测试（本地软件模拟测试、测试环境人员测试、生产环境实际测试）

intro.content: I used to cross the mountains and the sea
I yearn for the wind and freedom
Life is more than just in front of you
There are also poems and distant places
To see the world with my eyes and camera!

photos.title: The blend of simplicity and modernity
The speed at which the cherry blossoms fall

aboutPage.aboutSiteContent: My personal web site, just for fun, write something. In the beginning I deployed my site at github pages, and used others theme. However  markdown  was not easy  to write for me. I thought that I was a web developer, so I just started to construct a website on my own. The front end uses the Vue family bucket, and the UI library uses iView and add  i-18n adaption. The back end uses  Java Spring&SpringMVC&Mybatis framework. Recently, I deployed my site to Alibaba Cloud.Bingo,jobs done!

timeLineItems.activity: Git repository initialized and started to write the first version of website
Front-end performance optimization: first-screen loading optimization and image optimization
add volume by keyboard to music player
Change the layout of blog page
Add comment function to blog page
